snippet: The Foreign Ministry told ambassadors from France, Britain, Italy and Spain that their countries had shown bias in favor of the Palestinians.
abstract: Israeli Foreign Min Avigdor Lieberman summons ambassadors of Britain, France, Italy and Spain to complain about what he calls their countries' bias in favor of Palestinians; it is the latest diplomatic confrontation over Israeli settlement building and the first time Israel has summoned European ambassadors as a group over such an issue.
lead_paragraph: The Foreign Ministry told ambassadors from France, Britain, Italy and Spain that their countries had shown bias in favor of the Palestinians.

headline.main: Israel Summons 4 Envoys With Complaints About Bias
headline.print_headline: Israel Summons 4 Envoys With Complaints About Bias
